General.Name: Karsu Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Karsu Tekstil Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the production and sale of yarns in Turkey. The company offer modal, tencel, viscose, banboo, viloft, cotton, linen, silk, cashmere, wool, and mélange fashion yarns; and umorfil, coolmax, thermolite, seacell, smartcel, trevira, pes, acrylic, and nylon functional yarns. It provides lenzing FR, modacrylic, kermel, twaron, technora, meta-aramid, and para-aramid technical yarns; and knitting and weaving fabrics. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.
General.Address: Süksün Zafer Mah. Sedef Bulvari No:146, Kayseri, Turkey
